summary: This is a draft cover letter from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, dated October 7, 2021, concerning Ghislaine Maxwell. It appears to be internal correspondence regarding legal case preparation.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The document is a draft cover letter concerning Ghislaine Maxwell, indicating she is the subject of legal proceedings handled by the U.S. Attorney's Office.

keyFacts: The document is a draft cover letter concerning Ghislaine Maxwell dated October 7, 2021.
It originates from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The letter is part of the legal case preparation against Ghislaine Maxwell.
